marklogic.body: Why can't we have emergency clinics scattered throughout a city? The neighborhood groups of homeowners could be charged a certain fee, like CCR's and a viable clinic could be maintained. Docs could treat non-life threatening things like cut fingers and people with bad Cold symptoms to name a few. When the going gets too rough, 911 could transport to hospital. Just a thought from a humble person tired of this problem Always rearing its ugly head and nothing over the years has been done about it...fix it and we all will be healed!
